title: Challenger looking for chill games!
body:
Hi im challenger, ive got season rewards already for teams etc however the end of season is coming up so im just looking for norms or ranked teams, i don't really mind, very bored yo. Hit me up

"hugs over drugs"{{champion:32}}

replies.body:
I've been bored since most friends are grinding ranked and i've stopped so got no one to play norms with.
Feel free to add me if you wanna play :P
Pagoe

I'd also been keen for this. 

Aus Dave :D
